triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Deep learning is a core methodology reviewed in the paper as a key approach for achieving human-level AI systems.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Reinforcement learning is a primary technique discussed alongside deep learning as essential for achieving human-level AI.

triples.name: Model-based reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: World models are a component of model-based RL, an approach discussed in the paper for intelligent agent behavior.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper discusses achieving human-level or super-human AI systems as the ultimate goal of DL and RL approaches.

triples.name: Human intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper aims to achieve comprehensive understanding of human intelligence using advances in deep and reinforcement learning.
